quote: We do events to make our clients feel appreciated, and we just hope that down the road, that ultimately will result in some business.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the long-term value of client relationships over immediate sales.
suggested_hook: Why showing appreciation could be your best marketing strategy.

quote: A two-one rate buy down can save buyers hundreds in monthly payments, making homes more affordable now.
why_clipworthy: Provides a specific financial strategy that agents can use immediately.
suggested_hook: How to make homes affordable even with high interest rates.
